channel.title: mastoadmin on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in mastoadmin on Ross A. Baker

item.description: Shoutout to NixOS. It couldn't save me from my awful backup strategy, but it was the backbone of my configuration management, and I had a working Mastodon server again in minutes from scratch. #MastoAdmin #NixOS

When I accidentally obliterated my instance, I set up with a new WEB_DOMAIN and the original LOCAL_DOMAIN, so my handle hasn't changed. When I imported a month-old backup of follows, I immediately got hundreds of my old followers back. I may have invented a backhanded Move command? Don't try this at home. #MastoAdmin
